## Learning Outcomes {.ch}

After completing Class 38 you should...

* Know the definition/defining equation for a perfectly mixed stagnant zone
* Understand
    * zoned reactor models are inherently empirical
    * there are different ways of incorporating thermal effects into zoned reactor models
* Be able to
    * calculate the output molar flow rates and temperature from a given reactor using a zoned reactor model
